en_text: City Hunter: "Picking Pockets is a Thrill!\NPick Pockets For Tomorrow"
jp_text:
「盗ってもスリリング
明日に向ってすれ!!」

en_text: Don't miss it!
jp_text: 絶対見てね！
google_translated: I will definitely look at it!
